channel.title: Statistics on csMACnz's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on csMACnz's Blog

item.title: Visual Studio 2015 vs Visual Studio 2013
item.description: I’ve been running some numbers over our solution to try and make things more efficient. While I was at it, I figured I would put 2013 head to head with 2015. The main test I ran was to take a solution open in Visual Studio and make sure it builds. I then ran Clean Solution. Using a stopwatch (so accuracy +- 1-second values) I recorded how long it took to build.
